bug.summary: Training with DDP ended error and process in GPU died
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Training process ended incorrectly with DDP. It seems that the last checkpoint saved failed, causing one process in gpu died and cannot kill. <denchmark-h:h4>Code sample</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>import argparse
import pytorch_lightning as pl from pytorch_lightning.loggers import TensorBoardLogger from pytorch_lightning.callbacks import ModelCheckpoint from src.ADFA_stereo import Adfa_stereo16
check_point_callback = ModelCheckpoint( save_top_k = 1, save_last = True, monitor='avg_val_loss', mode='max' )
parser = argparse.ArgumentParser() parser.add_argument('--model_name',type=str,default='msc_ADFA_debug',help='model name') parser.add_argument('--train_info',type=str,default=None,help="training information") parser.add_argument('--num_workers',type=int ,default=8,help='Number of workers for dataloader') parser.add_argument('--batchsize',type=int ,default=1,help='batch size during training') parser.add_argument('--num_epochs',type=int ,default=60,help='number of epochs of training ') parser.add_argument('--start_epoch',type=int,default=0,help="start epoch number,must be int")
parser = Adfa_stereo16.add_model_specific_args(parser) parser = pl.Trainer.add_argparse_args(parser)
arg = parser.parse_args() print('training option',arg)
logger = TensorBoardLogger('logs',name=arg.model_name) cycstereo=Adfa_stereo16(arg)
trainer = pl.Trainer.from_argparse_args(arg,max_epochs=arg.num_epochs,logger=logger,default_root_dir='logs',checkpoint_callback=check_point_callback) print("---------------------\n** %s **\n---------------------\n"%cycstereo.hparams.model_name) trainer.fit(cycstereo) </denchmark-code>
